name: Taser Loser
description:
Taser Loser is a game made for Ludum Dare #40 (Theme: The more you have, the worse it is).

A game about Taserland, a city where people "invest" their money.
The more money you have, the more you fear.

Wait for enemies to appear! (Top left corner of the city)
When hit, they may get angry…
But they will give you money!

Controls: Z, X, C, Arrows

Z: Run
X: Taser
C: Jump
Arrows: Walk, Stairs

R: Restart
Esc: Exit

Have Fun!
